title: RAG Knowledge Base
description: Enhance AI response quality by storing and retrieving documents from vector databases.
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this?

errors.refreshAndRetry: Invalid request method. Please refresh and try again.
errors.collectionAlreadyExists: A collection with this name already exists. Please use a different name or edit the existing collection.
errors.syncRequired: Collection exists in vector store but needs to be synced with database. Please run synchronization.

warnings.configureEmbeddingModels: Please configure embedding models as "Public" and "Embedding Model" in the Model Management page.

vectorStores.title: Vector Store Management
vectorStores.description: Configure and manage vector database connections.
vectorStores.dialogDescription: Enter the vector database connection information.
vectorStores.name: Name
vectorStores.settingsPlaceholder: Optional: Additional settings in JSON format

chromadb.name: ChromaDB
chromadb.description: ChromaDB is an open-source vector database. Enter HTTP/HTTPS URL.

pgvector.name: pgvector (PostgreSQL)
pgvector.description: Uses PostgreSQL's pgvector extension. Enter PostgreSQL connection string.

faiss.name: Faiss (Local)
faiss.description: Uses Facebook AI Similarity Search (Faiss). Enter local file path.

collections.title: Collection Management
collections.description: Create and manage collections in vector databases.
collections.dialogDescription: Create a new collection or edit an existing one.
collections.name: Name
collections.nameDescription: A unique name to identify this collection.
collections.descriptionDescription: Describe the purpose or types of documents in this collection. (Optional)
collections.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for this collection.
collections.vectorStoreDescription: The vector database where document embeddings will be stored. Cannot be changed after creation.
collections.embeddingModelDescription: AI model to convert documents into vectors. Cannot be changed after creation.
collections.dimensionsDescription: Number of dimensions in the embedding vectors. Automatically set based on the selected model.
collections.chunkingStrategyDescription: Default method for splitting documents into smaller chunks. Can be overridden during document upload.
collections.cleansingConfigDescription: Default settings for document preprocessing. Includes header/footer removal, encoding fixes, etc.
collections.rerankingStrategyDescription: Default strategy for reordering search results. Can improve search quality.
collections.noVectorStores: Please create a vector store first.

success.synced: Existing collection has been synced to database.

copyDialog.title: Copy Collection
copyDialog.description: Create a new collection by copying an existing one.
copyDialog.requiredFieldsError: Please fill in all required fields.

copyResult.both: Both documents and vector data will be copied.
copyResult.documentsOnly: Only documents will be copied, vectors must be regenerated.
copyResult.vectorsOnly: Only vector data will be copied.
copyResult.empty: An empty collection will be created.

documents.title: Document Management
documents.description: Upload and manage documents in collections.
documents.uploadDescription: Upload documents to a collection. You can select multiple files at once.
documents.uploadSettingsDescription: Configure the collection and processing options for document upload.
documents.collectionDescription: The collection where documents will be stored. Each collection has its own vector store and settings.
documents.supportedFormats: Supported formats: PDF, Word, PowerPoint, Text, HTML, Markdown, CSV, JSON
documents.filesDescription: Select document files to upload. You can drag and drop or click to select files.
documents.chunkingStrategyDescription: Specify how documents should be split into chunks. You can use the default or select a specific strategy.
documents.cleansingConfigDescription: Specify how documents should be preprocessed. Includes options like header/footer removal, encoding fixes, etc.
documents.regenerateMultipleDescription: Regenerate selected documents with different settings.

chunking.title: Chunking Strategies
chunking.description: Configure how documents are split into chunks.
chunking.name: Name

cleansing.title: Data Cleansing
cleansing.description: Configure rules for cleaning document text.
cleansing.name: Name

settings.description: Configure chunking strategies and data cleansing settings.

reranking.title: Reranking Strategies
reranking.description: Configure strategies to rerank search results.
reranking.name: Name
reranking.nameDescription: A unique name to identify this reranking strategy.

typeDescriptions.model_based: Uses an AI model to re-evaluate and reorder search results based on relevance.
typeDescriptions.rule_based: Reorders search results according to predefined rules.
typeDescriptions.hybrid: Combines model-based and rule-based approaches for reranking.
typeDescriptions.none: Returns original search results without any reranking.

reranking.modelDescription: AI model to use for re-evaluating search results. Can use dedicated reranking models or general LLMs.
reranking.topKDescription: Maximum number of results to return after reranking. E.g., setting to 10 returns only the top 10 results.
reranking.minScoreDescription: Only return results with scores above this threshold. Value between 0-1, higher values apply stricter filtering.
reranking.settingsDescription: Strategy-specific advanced settings in JSON format. E.g., {"threshold": 0.7, "boost_recent": true}
reranking.isDefaultDescription: Set this strategy as the default reranking strategy. Will be used when collections don't specify a strategy.

errors.modelRequired: Model selection is required for model-based reranking.

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.description: Quick access to frequently used operations.
